titles.title: Veteran Tax Parity Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income discharges of Federal student loans as a result of veterans' service-connected total disability that is permanent in nature.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/10/2014--Introduced. Veteran Tax Parity Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income imputed income from the discharge of student loan indebtedness of a veteran with a service-connected total disability that is determined to be permanent in nature.
